mapper.select: select * from erp_p_order_master m left join erp_provider p on m.provider_id = p.provider_id left join erp_emp em on m.emp_id = em.emp_id left join erp_store st on m.store_id = st.store_id left join erp_buying_order b on m.bo_number = b.bo_number left join erp_emp em1 on m.sup_emp_id = em1.emp_id left join erp_p_order_detail d on m.po_number = d.po_number left join erp_product s on d.product_id = s.product_id
